com.acrolinx.javasdk.core.server.adapter

Class UserPropertiesPersistenceStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrolinx.javasdk.core.server.adapter.UserPropertiesPersistenceStrategy

  • public class UserPropertiesPersistenceStrategy
extends Object
    The UserPropertiesPersistenceStrategy has two functions. First, it is a cache. It caches the user properties provided by UserPropertiesStore for the duration defined in INVALIDATION_TIME. Save-User-Properties-Actions will invalidate the cache, because the effective properties after save may depend on server logic. The second function is the filtering of unchanged properties. Only if a value is changed it will be sent to the server. The strategy also migrates old "Acrolinx IQ" properties to new "Acrolinx" properties. Note: No guava cache is used because it seems not to work with Oxygen class loader.
